outputs.output_descr: - improve normative framework of laws, procedures and government to enhance access to and the administration of justice; - increase legal awareness and ability to access justice among the vulnerable, conflict-and tsunami-affected populations; - strengthen institutional capacity of the formal and informal justice systems to provide access to justice, uphold the rule of law, protect human rights and promote an integrated justice system; - increase capacity of civil society to monitor and advocate for the rights of the disadvantaged, to disseminate information to promote citizens's rights and to perform an oversight function of the justice system and act as a force for public accountability

project_descr: Support to Justice for Peace and Development in Aceh
project_title: Support to Justice for Peace and Development in Aceh
